title: U.S. Debt Rises by Half a Trillion in Two Weeks, Bitcoin ($BTC) Price Advances
description: The United States has seen its national debt soar by over half a trillion dollars in the mere span of two weeks, according to the most recent statistics from FiscalData. The debt rose while BTC prices fell as the SEC sued leading cryptocurrency exchanges, but BTC has since recovered to be up nearly 10% for [â€¦]
